column4: Can someone tell me how to get apache2 to autostart on Gutsy?
/etc/init.d/apache2 start will do the job manually, I would suspect having to enter the line in the rc.local, however I believe it should startup automatically unless otherwise told.
I thought it would but it doesn't
sry, I'm not that much a geek in linux. There are probably others here that help with such a easy problem.
